bwwExcerpt: ...there is very little excitement to be found in this drab and dragging stage adaptation, which was penned by Richard Greenberg ("Take Me Out") and is directed by Sean Mathias...For the most part, Greenberg simply lifts passages from the book and has the writer (Cory Michael Smith) awkwardly and constantly deliver first-person narrations directly to the audience.
